channel.title: How do I update my items.xml on my client?
channel.description: I have an old list of items on my item id's xml. I downloaded a 601 item db but idk how to put that as my main items.xml. So when people click file<item it's it'll show them the 601 item db. How? Thanks!

item.title: How do I update my items.xml on my client?
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

I have an old list of items on my item id’s xml.
I downloaded a 601 item db but idk how to put that as my main items.xml.
So when people click file<item it’s it’ll show them the 601 item db.
How?
Thanks!
